input.sentences: i went for a quick walk down the street one day .
there were a lot of ponds in people 's yards .
when i got to the bridge i decided to walk over it .
there was a beautiful building on the other side .
after being out for an hour i went back home .
output.sentences: Look at all the messages written by lovers.
Seems like the pond is a little dead this year.
But the bridge is still as pretty as ever.
Along with the Mayor's beautiful house.
And of course the pretty blossoming trees around this time of year.
